thread.title: Fifty Shades Freed Teaser Trailer - Fifty Shades Third Movie Trailer
thread.title_full: Fifty Shades Freed Teaser Trailer - Fifty Shades Third Movie Trailer

author: Maggie Maloney
title: Fifty Shades Freed Teaser Trailer - Fifty Shades Third Movie Trailer
text:
Your First Look at 'Fifty Shades Freed' Has Arrived 
Only approximately 364 days until it hits theaters. Most Popular By Maggie Maloney Feb 10, 2017 Now that Fifty Shades Darker has been released and thoroughly analyzed by fans, we can start anticipating the next film in the trilogy. Luckily, the first teaser of Fifty Shades Freed has arrived, and it's quietly tucked into the closing credits of Fifty Shades Darker. Which means you'll have to see Fifty Shades Darker to watch the teaser—which is fine because we know you're seeing it anyway—but you'll have to stay in your seat through the end credits. Dedication, but we're here for it. Advertisement - Continue Reading Below If you're a spoiler junkie (), here's what you'll see in the teaser: Anastasia wearing a wedding dress and veil, the back of a mystery (your guess is as good as ours) man's head, what sounds like wedding vows read by Christian, a private jet, a sexual-tension filled moment at the beach, and a good old-fashioned shower make-out session. "I solemnly vow to keep you safe for as long as we both shall live," Christian says at the end of the teaser. So much new intel yet so many mysteries remain! Most Popular Don't fret— Fifty Shades Freed will be released on February 9, 2018, right before Valentine's Day. Meaning you have one calendar year to fully enjoy the glorious-ness that is Fifty Shades Darker . Follow Marie Claire on F acebook for the latest celeb news, beauty tips, fascinating reads, livestream video, and more. More from Marie Claire:
